abstracts.cdata!:
The project would comprise: construction
            of a 1,600 TPD urea plant at Ashuganj with an intermediate
            ammonia production plant of 925 TPD and all necessary
            ancillary facilities, management assistance during
            construction and the initial period of operation, and
            training of staff.
